ext_descriptions.ext_description: An Evaluated_characteristic may be a . The Evaluated_characteristic provides a mechanism to validate or evaluate a .
the evaluation_result specifies the for the Evaluated_characteristic.

the product_characterization_data specifies the for an Evaluated_characteristic. There shall be one or more coordinated_characterstic for an Evaluated_characteristic. The product_characterization_data need not be provided for a specific Evaluated_characteristic.

the product_data_status specifies the for the Evaluated_characteristic. The product_data_status provides a status of valid, invalid, not_evaluatable, or to_be_evaluated for an Evaluated_characteristic.
the planned_product_data specifies the role of the for an Evaluated_characteristic.

A Planned_characteristic associates design intent information based on manufacturing capabilities and component characteristics with an allocated requirement. A Planned_characteristic is a set of properties planned to be valid for all occurrences of the designed product under the conditions defined in the allocated requirement.
the planned_coordinated_characteristic specifies the role of the for the Planned_characteristic.
the reference_requirement specifies the for the Planned_characteristic.
A Rule_based_evaluated_characteristic is a type of . The Rule_based_evaluated_characteristic identifies the used to validate or evaluate a .
the evaluating_rule specifies the role of the for a Rule_based_evaluated_characteristic.
An Evaluation_ee_product_definition is a type of that contains the results of evaluating another .

the evaluation_data specifies the that contains the detailed product data resulting from the evaluation for the Evaluation_ee_product_definition. There shall be one or more for an Evaluation_ee_product_definition.
the evaluated_product_definition specifies the that was evaluated for the Evaluation_ee_product_definition.
